name: Lyssandra

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in all Battles by 24%.

skills.name: Transference
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Transfers all debuffs from this Champion to the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Exhaustion
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fully depletes the target's Turn Meter.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Energize
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 30%. Decreases the Turn Meter of all enemies by 30%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
